mapper.select: SELECT blog.id AS id, blog.title AS title, blog.content AS content, blog.create_time AS createTime, category.`name` AS categoryName, category.id AS categoryId FROM blog INNER JOIN category ON blog.category_id = category.id ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT blog.title AS title, blog.id AS id, blog.create_time AS createTime, category.`name` AS categoryName FROM category INNER JOIN blog ON category.id = blog.category_id WHERE category.id = #{id} ORDER BY createTime DESC
